entries.description: Restructuring charges for workforce optimization program announced in Q2. Primarily severance costs across Canadian retail and U.S. operations.
Gain on sale of non-core real estate portfolio in Western Canada. Part of ongoing branch footprint rationalization.
Amortization of intangibles from 2022 wealth management acquisition. Expected to continue for 6 more quarters.
Release of legal provision following favorable settlement. Related to legacy trading practices matter.
